classical.title: Classical
classical.description: Apps for performing calculations based on classical/empirical force fields.

technology-aiida.title: AiiDA
technology-aiida.description: The app utilizes the AiiDA infrastructure (https://www.aiida.net/).

technology-aiidalab.title: AiiDAlab
technology-aiidalab.description: The app utilizes the AiiDAlab platform (https://www.materialscloud.org/work/aiidalab).

technology-ase.title: ASE
technology-ase.description: The app utilizes the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) toolkit (https://wiki.fysik.dtu.dk/ase/).

technology-materials-cloud.title: Materials Cloud
technology-materials-cloud.description: The app utilizies the Materials Cloud (https://www.materialscloud.org).

wp1.title: WP1
wp1.description: Project management and education, exploitation and outreach.
